```{r generate_package_table}
# How to set hyperlinks for each package:
#   https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35078430/including-links-within-rmarkdown-tables-pdf

library(knitr)
pkgs <- as.data.frame(pkgAvail(repos='/path/to/repo'))
urls <- paste0(pkgs$Package, '_report', '.html')
pkgs$Package <- paste0("[", pkgs$Package, "](", urls, ")")
kable(pkgs[,c("Package","Version")], format = 'markdown', row.names = FALSE)
```
